# Remote Links for Minecraft Fabric Modding (1.21.11)

## Official Documentation

- **Fabric API (1.21.11):** [API reference and docs](https://maven.fabricmc.net/docs/fabric-api-0.141.3+1.21.11/)
- **Fabric Loader:** [Loader documentation](https://maven.fabricmc.net/docs/fabric-loader-0.18.4/)
- **Yarn mappings (1.21.11+build.4):** [Mappings browser](https://maven.fabricmc.net/docs/yarn-1.21.11+build.4/)
- **Fabric developer guides:** [Guides and tutorials](https://docs.fabricmc.net/develop/)
- **Fabric wiki:** [General modding wiki](https://fabricmc.net/wiki/start)
- **Fabric Loom:** [Build tool documentation](https://docs.fabricmc.net/develop/loom/)
- **Mappings Dev Overview:** [Mappings Dev Overview](https://mappings.dev/1.21.11/index.html)
- **Fabric Dependencies:** [List of Fabric libraries](https://linkie.shedaniel.dev/dependencies?loader=fabric&version=1.21.11)

## Mixins

- **Mixin wiki:** [Mixin documentation](https://github.com/SpongePowered/Mixin/wiki)
- **Injection point reference:** [Injection strategies](https://github.com/SpongePowered/Mixin/wiki/Injection-Point-Reference)

## Minecraft Internals

- **MCPConfig (historical reference):** [Mappings and internals](https://github.com/MinecraftForge/MCPConfig)

## Example Mods

- **Architectury Template:** [Multi-platform template](https://github.com/architectury/architectury-templates)
- **Fabric Example Mod:** [Reference implementation](https://github.com/FabricMC/fabric-docs/tree/main/reference/latest)
- **Fabric Example Mod - Main:** [Main Reference implementation](https://github.com/FabricMC/fabric-docs/tree/main/reference/latest/src/main)
- **Fabric Example Mod - Client:** [Client Reference implementation](https://github.com/FabricMC/fabric-docs/tree/main/reference/latest/src/client)
- **Fabric Example Mod - Gametest:** [Gametest Reference implementation](https://github.com/FabricMC/fabric-docs/tree/main/reference/latest/src/gametest)
- **Fabric Example Mod - Test:** [Test Reference implementation](https://github.com/FabricMC/fabric-docs/tree/main/reference/latest/src/test)

## Tools

- **Mod Menu (1.21.11):** [Mod menu UI](https://github.com/TerraformersMC/ModMenu/tree/1.21.11)
- **REI (1.21.11):** [Item viewer](https://github.com/shedaniel/RoughlyEnoughItems/tree/1.21.11)
- **Datapack Helper Plus:** [Datapack language server](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=SPGoding.datapack-language-server)
